content: Today I'm too busy to print and explain too much... holidays, guests, Xmas, New Year, etc.But many know about scamshit called - Veriblock (VBK). After 7-8 years of Â "development", they didn't do anything that they promised.Now they begin (trying to start) their next "revolutionary" project.Last time, the revolution was VBK - the only blockchain defender in its class from 51% attack. But after all these years, not a single coin use this "VBK protection".In general, these scammers, except for the fact that they are scammers, they are also miserable and stupid.The new project E.M.M.E. means the following:EthicalMarketMakingExchangeBut as for me, "Elon. Musk's. Magic. Erection", is more suitable.Watch the video, check out, express your opinion.The opinion of the scamshit defenders will be removed.Yes it is. Because all the posts that are against these scam projects - VBK and E.M.M.E, are deleted in the discord. So in revenge, I will delete them here =DThis topic is not created for advertising this shit. And so that people do not invest their money in this crap. On VBK IEO crap, they stole $7 million.After the New Year's holidays, I will gradually replenish this topic with screenshots of all empty promises that this useless pseudo-team made and so on.Links to scamshit:https://em.me/https://veriblock.org/
